title: Houston Astros vs Kansas City Royals Live Stream Free, Game 4 Preview: How to Watch AL Division Series 2015 Online
text:
Houston Astros vs Kansas City Royals Live Stream Free, Game 4 Preview: How to Watch AL Division Series 2015 Online 0 By Jim Gardner   12:03 pm (Photo: Reuters/Denny Medley-USA TODAY Sports) Kansas City Royals players celebrate on the field after defeating the Baltimore Orioles in game four of the 2014 ALCS playoff baseball game at Kauffman Stadium. 
The AL Division Series between the Houston Astros and the Kansas City Royals continues on Columbus Day with Game 4 from Minute Maid Park in Houston, Texas. The Astros have the chance to close out this series here today with a win, but the Royals will be going all out to level the series up again to take this all the way to a decisive Game 5. 
Coming in Game 4 of this MLB Playoffs series the Astros lead 2-1, and have home field advantage. However, if they do not grab their chance to end things today then the Royals can look forward to taking this series back to Kansas City for the winner takes all Game 5 scheduled for Wednesday. 
Today's game will have an opening pitch at 1.07 p.m. ET, with live coverage available on FS1. The game can also be watched online with a live stream link (details below). 
The Astros claimed Game 3 on Sunday night in a 4-2 win at Minute Maid Park, bouncing back well from going behind in the fourth inning, to hit a stream of runs through the fifth to seventh innings. Despite a late rally from the Royals in the ninth, the Astros were able to close out the game and move to within just one more win from the AL Championship Series. 
Game 4's pitching match up will see Lance McCullers for the Astros face off against Yordano Ventura or the Royals. 
McCullers went 6-7 on a 3.22 ERA this season with 129 strikeouts. In comparison, Ventura went 13-8 with a 4.08 ERA and 156 strikeouts. 
Ventura will be hoping to keep the Royals postseason ambitions alive for one more game, but will have to stand up to the pressure from a hostile Houston crowd at Minute Maid Park today. 
Game 4 between the Royals and Astros starts at 1.07 p.m. ET and can be watched through live stream by clicking here .
